item.title: Serverless Database
item.author: xieydd
item.description: DuckDB (In-Process OLAP) MotherDuck simple data lakerhouse: DuckDB + Dagster + S3 Modern Data Stack: Meltano + DuckDB + dbt + Superset kafka streaming pipeline from Postgres to DuckDB Iceberg API + S3 + DuckDB (Parquet) Postgres Neon EDB StarRocks (MPP OLAP) ClickHouse (MPP OLAP) ClickHouse-Local 引用 https://supabase.com/blog/supabase-acquires-oriole https://neon.tech/blog/architecture-decisions-in-neon#fn-2
